attributes.action: Encourage employers to allow their employees to work from home
attributes.additional_details: Less air pollution for everyone, better health and less illness. Wildlife returning to areas where they been absent for many years. Less time travelling by car and public transport = a cleaner environment, less time travelling for the employee, less stress, more quality time with family due to wasted travelling time.
attributes.background: During lockdown there has been a massive reduction on air pollution, much of which must be down to more people working from home.
